title: Can't Change Clan Tag.
body: I changed my clan tag to something different. Now I want to change it back to it's original. How do I change it back? I right click the clan I want to change my clan tag to but nothing shows up. I've checked the settings and I can't find anything. There is no pin that you can click like in the last client. Help.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: I had to ask around a little bit, but as far as I could find out I don't believe it's possible to have the club names or tags changed once they've been set. It's not the best solution, but if you need that tag to be something different you'll need to create a new club =\ .
